title: Amazon FBA Sourcing VA – 10 Quality Leads Per Day (No Fluff, No Training Needed)
job_overview:
???? Job Description:
Do NOT apply if you:

Can’t hit strict sourcing criteria

Don’t use Keepa, SellerAmp, and Amazon daily

Want training — this is not for beginners

I’m hiring 1 experienced Amazon OA Sourcing VA to deliver 10 usable leads per day (Monday–Saturday). You must already know how to source winning, ungateable, profitable products without BS or hand-holding.

? What I Expect from You (Daily):
10 Amazon leads meeting ALL of the following:

BSR under 200K

At least 50 sales/month

Minimum of $4 profit

Auto-ungate OR test ungate with 10 units

No IP alerts

No UPC mismatches

In stock and buyable

Minimum 50% ROI (unless it’s a strong replen or bundle)

Use Keepa (must understand drops, rotation, and stock history)

Use SellerAmp for analysis and alerts

Google Sheet format with source link, ASIN, ROI, sales/month, etc.

???? Pay & Perks:
Trial rate: $3.50/hour for 1 week

Raise to $4/hour if you consistently meet quality expectations with opportunity for raises

Bonuses for overperformance or exclusive leads

Weekly pay, long-term role for top performers

Opportunity to work on a growing brand with full-time potential

???? To Apply (Read This Carefully):
Message me with:

“I’m your Rockstar Sourcing VA” in the subject line

2 sample leads you personally sourced — must meet all criteria above

Brief explanation of your sourcing experience + tools used

How soon you can start + how many hours/day you can work

If you can’t follow these instructions, you won’t be considered. I’m only looking for VAs who take pride in their work, follow criteria, and want to grow with a brand that’s scaling fast.
